initial_state: User is logged into the 4ga Boards web app and has access to a board with at least one card.
steps: Navigate to the board containing the card to be labelled.
Select the card by clicking on it to open the card details.
Locate the labelling option within the card details.
Choose a label from the available options or create a new label if necessary.
Apply the label to the card.
expected_state: The card is marked with the selected label, which is visible within the card details and on the board overview.
